name: Hitman Crimes Contract Killer
description:
In Hitman Crimes Contract Killer you are a hitman for hire in and open world.

 

A VAST 3D OPEN-WORLD
Do you like open world offline and free roam games? Do you like sandbox games where you can do everything you want? Than this is the game for you!

Hitman Crimes  Contract Killer is an open world third person shooter game. The big map, (similar to GTA San Andreas and Vice City by Rockstar Games, or Saint Row by Violitio) is fully explorable: you can walk around the city, buy cars, race against people, fight the crime, complete contracts, activities and more. The best part is, this is an open world game with the best mobile graphics. You can even play this open world game offline!

 

FULL OF ACTIVITIES
Take full control of the city of Andreas, a city full of crime and danger. Defeat the gangsters and take the lead of this beautiful city. Rival tribes will do nothing against you! This is a open world game with high graphics and can be played multiplayer or even offline. This is an open world game for fans of gta and hitman like games.

 

LOTS OF CONTENT: CARS, WEAPONS, AND MORE!
Car, weapons, money.. everything you need you can find it here!

In Hitman Crimes Contract Killer you can use different types of motor vehicles, grand theft auto missions to take over the city and outrun the police, or just obey every traffic light. Stealing auto cars, evading cops, racing through streets, and shooting down other gangs… Take control of the city, it can be all yours! A big open world game with missions, that you can play online or offline for free!

 

REALISTIC LIFE SIMULATION
This is an open world exploration game: explore every inch of Andreas City, a city of liberty. Discover secrets and special items. Complete action mission, contract, racing challenge, secret collectible, and commit grand theft auto like a real gangster. One of the best open world offline games. 

Game Features:
- Unique mixer of a shooter, hitman, punch game and auto racing!
- Open world game with high graphics 
- Realistic 3D graphic game
- Open world adventure game offline, free roam game
- Tons of missions and activities
- 15+ weapons and auto vehicles
- Open world driving game, lots of car to choose.
- A realistic 3D criminal underworld bustling with real life and crime
- Customize your gangster using a variety of clothes and equipment
- A wide range of weapons and dozens of vehicles for you to steal
- Realistic life simulation and physics

Upcoming updates:
-New weapons
-New upgrade system (upgrade weapons etc)
-New customization system
-New cars
-New bosses and boss
-Much more

 

!EARLY ACCESS!
Be aware: the game is still under heavy development, you can experience bugs, glitches, and more. Follow us on our social channels to find more about upcoming updates, and to participate in pools and discussions for future updates

 

Hurry up and download this open world, free roam, open world game: Hitman Crimes Contract Killer, for FREE!

Stay tuned, new updates are coming soon!
